vote.title: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 31655, previously approved on September 23, 2020, authorizing certain transfers and appropriation adjustments for FY 2020-21 for the maintenance and operation of various departments, activities, and amending the capital budget; and authorize the City Manager to implement those adjustments - Not to exceed $3,898,689,611 - Financing:  General Fund ($1,445,788,159), Enterprise, Internal Service, and Other Funds ($1,361,056,214), Capital Funds ($1,008,226,111), and Grants, Trusts and Other Funds ($83,619,127)
vote.description: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 31655, previously approved on September 23, 2020, authorizing certain transfers and appropriation adjustments for FY 2020-21 for the maintenance and operation of various departments, activities, and amending the capital budget; and authorize the City Manager to implement those adjustments - Not to exceed $3,898,689,611 - Financing:  General Fund ($1,445,788,159), Enterprise, Internal Service, and Other Funds ($1,361,056,214), Capital Funds ($1,008,226,111), and Grants, Trusts and Other Funds ($83,619,127)
